column4: What is the screen shot tool that will allow you to draw a box around what you want to copy?
theres a snapshot app that runs if you press print screen, you can change the option to be a region
What is the app name, my print screen button doesn't open a program that will allow a region selection
joaopinto: its in accessories -> take screen shot
point taken, however this is to help co-workers and they want something a little less thought provoking
they want a web front end that asks questions about disasters, probabilities and impacts to determine what the policy needs to state.
I could, but they have told me I have other priorities :)
openbox is very alive, its just not as "pretty" as the others but it uses a fraction of the resources
Is pypanel and netwmpager old or just not enough desire to have in the repos?
do you mean the unity panel on the left or the top panel?
I want to add Remminal to the top panel
not sure, as far asa I've seen its not very changable, if you boot to the normal desktop and start unity then you may be able to add stuff
Thanks, I really liked having all of my rdesktop servers in one list. I will look for something else.
